text: Yes, Norman Productions is the television production company of actress Kaley Cuoco, based in Beverly Hills, California, USA. It produced the DC Network's adult animated TV series Harley Quinn (2019–present) and HBO Max's TV comedy- drama The Flight Attendant (2020–present). The upcoming projects of company is Pretty, America's Sweetheart and Untitled Doris Day project. Often producing TV series with Warner Bros. Television Studios and Berlanti Productions. == References == Category:American television producers
title: Yes, Norman Productions
